metadata.synopsis: Rolan is being Rolan here - full of pride and arrogance, even as he begrudingly admits that the player played a large part in defending them from the druids.

0.speaker: Rolan
0.text: So you can handle yourself. Not bad - those druids really should have known better.
0.context: NodeContext: In the middle of a fight - fired up and eager to prove yourself.

1.speaker: Rolan
1.text: Let them come! I'll end them with a single spell.
1.context: NodeContext: In the middle of a fight - fired up and eager to prove yourself.
